title: Toffee apple and pear crumble
ingredients: ['For the toffee sauce', '60ml milk', '125g unsalted butter', '225g dark brown sugar', '1 pinch salt', 'For the crumble', '4 pears', '2 apples', '50g rolled oats', '25g mixed nuts', '115g unsalted butter', '110g dark brown sugar', '100g plain flour']
